phrases: Were you able to see the Tomoebi?
He has not changed at all.
Episode Fifteen: The Protector of Smiles
Overall, he seems to be just fine.
Just be mindful of keeping him hydrated.
Make sure he gets about 400cc of water every hour.
Tomorrow, the brain surgeon will be back from the city,
so have the surgeon look at him, too.
Oh, would it be all right if I tagged along then?
I have some questions for Hikari-kun.
I am sure that Hikari's very tired, having just woken up,
so could you hold off on doing all sorts of tests?
I think... there is a lot of catching up that he still has to do.
He should be given a little more time...
I am very sorry about that.
Please give me a call if there are any changes.
No, we have to let him get some more rest.
You look like you have just seen a monster.
I am the one that is surprised.
You are the same age as me, then.
Not to mention Akari has a kid...
Well, I guess I knew things like this could happen during the hibernation.
Is there something wrong with your eyes?
Everything is really bright and it is hard to see.
Well, you were hibernating that whole time.
You are just not used to the brightness of the surface yet.
Come on, back to sleep you go.
Chisaki will probably come by tomorrow or so.
meaning Chisaki probably got pretty old, too.
She is got a nice body.
I-I do not care about stuff like that.
Chisaki-san does not need to go see Hikari-kun?
Apparently she has some test today.
So that is how it is...
Apparently Chisaki-san's colder than I thought.
What is with all the racket?
I thought I would give him a real taste of three years of pain.
I gave them a call, but apparently Chisaki's busy today.
If Chisaki-san and Tsumugu-kun were going to come by,
I would take some time off so we could all barbecue.
We do not need to do anything out of the ordinary.
We have not even put a dent into the loan for this house.
Keep up the hard work, Dad.
And this early in the morning...
I have matured quite a bit, no?
Actually, it is sort of gross.
I will take you around, so let us go see all of them.
Oh, Hikari's not completely recovered yet...
Do you two want a ride to school?
We are going to make a few stops first, though...
Talk about a turn of events.
It is like a dream, so I do not understand everything.
What is with the line from a chick flick?
I mean, this is something really weird and different.
So it is more like a surprise.
And then Egawa had been getting around...
Oh, and in high school, he was going out with Yaragi.
He should not have tried to settle with someone so close by, right?
By the way, Honjin is working at the government office.
that means the other people from the sea will be up soon, too, right?
Right about now, we would be able to drink some great sake with them.
Hey, let us not talk about depressing things so early in the morning.
It is the flag you waved at the Ofunehiki.
About three years ago, we found it stuck on the bridge pier.
That way, no one will get lost.
I just need to rest a little.
More importantly, please take Hikari home.
Hikari had not changed at all...
and now I am the same age he is.
If Hikari-kun came back up at this point here...
It means that there is a possibility that the tidal current changes here, right?
It is different from last month's investigations.
But according to the reflection of the Tomoebi...
I think there is a pair in Chisaki's room.
I did not know you were back.
That is a pretty bold question.
Have I changed from back then?
I had not seen you like that back then, so I am not sure.
You used to talk about that back then, too, did not you?
I did not want anyone to change...
The truth is I did not want Hikari to change...
I am the one that changed.
You have gotten much prettier since back then.
I thought I would take a little walk.
Mom, have you heard from Chisaki-san?
I sort of cannot believe it.
It is been two days since Hikari came back.
I think Hikari might be down because Chisaki-san has not come to see him.
And Tsumugu has not been by since either.
Hey, could you call them, Mom?
Well... it is not like I do not understand how they feel.
Let us hurry and finish this up.
She left to pay Gramps a visit.
Why does not Chisaki-san go see him?
I do not think you would understand, Miuna.
B-But I am as old as Hikari now, too!
Because I do not get it either.
Those two have known each other a lot longer than we have.
There have to be things that only those two understand.
I am being left out again...
Why do not you come see Chisaki?
Why do I have to go see her?
For me, it was the day before yesterday!
The Ofunehiki was the day before yesterday for me!
For me, time has not passed at all!
Even right now, I am overwhelmed!
Akari has a kid, and all of you...
Even though it is still summer, the scenery...
Of course I cannot just go waltz in to see Chisaki.
The two of us were always together...
I do not want to see any more things that've changed!
I do not want to think about all of this!
I do not want to know!
It was not that his eyes were bothering him or he was feeling sick...
And then the guys at the fishery cooperative give me the flag...
The one you were waving at the Ofunehiki?
Manaka said that if I waved it, no one would get lost...
So is Manaka, Kaname, Dad, everyone.
All of them are still lost in the sea...
They are just hibernating, so you do not have to worry.
The fact that you came back proves that.
I am going down there again.
No matter which way you go, you cannot get into Shioshishio...
Do not get in the way.
I put it all the way down there...
I was so happy that Hikari came back...
So happy that we were now the same age...
that I could not even understand something as simple as this.
The people of Ooshi wanted to make sure it could be heard by everyone sleeping...
So now it is the 5 of the clock song.
So everyone was thinking about us...
All this about changing or whatever.
You were saying the same thing the other day.
It is the other day for me!
I was scared that everyone is relationship would change.
After I woke up, I really understood.
How scary it is for things to change.
I am so relieved that you did not change at all!
I-I do not need to hear that from you.
I see you are as violent as ever.
I will not be surprised at all anymore, damn it!
I-I did it in a hurry, so it is not the best...
I thought they would be cute...
Putting hearts and butterflies on an Ofunehiki flag...
I was so happy to see Hikari's smile.
There were a lot of things that I did not understand,
and a lot of things that could not be reached...
Do not just stand there, come in.
I am Sakishima, who is repeating this class.
Please call me Senpai and respect me.
I am going to hold your hand so you do not wander off.
The person you like woke up!
Episode Sixteen: The Whispers of the Faraway Waves
